title: The Writer's Almanac for Monday, February 28, 2022
description: Colum McCann celebrates his 57th birthday today. His latest work, “Apeirogon,” is a novel about a friendship between two men, one Israeli and one Palestinian.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Colum McCann celebrates his 57th birthday today. His latest work, “Apeirogon,” is a novel about a friendship between two men, one Israeli and one Palestinian.
